Docs.summary: Provides classes that allow you to create spell checkers in a manner similar to the input method framework (for IMEs).

remarks.para: Provides classes that allow you to create spell checkers in a manner similar to the input method framework (for IMEs).

To create a new spell checker, you must implement a service that extends and extend the class to provide spelling suggestions based on text provided by the interface's callback methods. In the callback methods, you must return the spelling suggestions as objects.

Applications with a spell checker service must declare the permission as required by the service. The service must also declare an intent filter with <action android:name="android.service.textservice.SpellCheckerService" /> as the intentâ€™s action and should include a <meta-data> element that declares configuration information for the spell checker.
